articles.author: Marshall Cohen
articles.title: Elon Musk’s daily $1 million giveaway to registered voters could be illegal, experts say - CNN
articles.description: While stumping for former President Donald Trump on Saturday, tech billionaire Elon Musk announced that he will give away $1 million each day to registered voters in battleground states, immediately drawing scrutiny from election law experts who said the swee…
